sentences.sentence: Our team is striving for developing superb performance, most compatible products offering ultimate facileness and fun to end users.
sentences.translation: 我们的团队致力于开发卓越的性能，最兼容的产品，为最终用户提供终极的便利性和乐趣。

sentences.sentence: Our professional and experienced R&D team is striving for developing superb performance, most reliable and most compatible products offering ultimate facileness and fun to end users.
sentences.translation: 我们有专业的、有经验的R&D团队来开发出最好的产品，为最终消费者提供基本的易操作和乐趣。
